    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Genie Weapon Flourish](/Feats.aspx?ID=2548) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ifrit" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=301" />
<trait label="Oread" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=304" />
<trait label="Suli" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=310" />
<trait label="Sylph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=311" />
<trait label="Undine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=314" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 99 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Genie Weapon Familiarity](/Feats.aspx?ID=2547)

</column>

---

Whenever you critically hit using a [falchion](/Weapons.aspx?ID=18), [ranseur](/Weapons.aspx?ID=35), [scimitar](/Weapons.aspx?ID=38), [trident](/Weapons.aspx?ID=45), or a [geniekin](/Traits.aspx?ID=340) weapon, you apply the weapon's [critical specialization effect](/Rules.aspx?ID=235).
name: Genie Weapon Flourish
